page.title: 14Playground Games.
page.content: At playtime we are allowed to play allsorts of games.One of the most popular is{football}.The aim is to score as many goals as you you canto do this you have to kick a ball through two posts called goal posts.You tackle the person who has the ball.Two teams play and whichever team scores the most wins.{Scarecrow {tig}is popular too.The idea is for one person to catch another,touch them and say "Scarecrow".this person must stand quite still with arms outstretched.He can only move if someone runs under his arms.After being caught three times you become the chaser.Other popular games include{Skipping}using a length of rope,{Hide and seek},{ {British Bulldog}which is another chase game and {marbles}.{Marbles}are small coloured glass balls.
